## 安装

```bash filename="安装" switcher
# 当前目录 /www2024/4_tutorial/2025
pnpm create fumadocs-app
.../197a9b1da7c-44d7                     |  +11 +
.../197a9b1da7c-44d7                     | Progress: resolved 11, reused 8, downloaded 3, added 11, done
┌  Create Fumadocs App
│
◇  Project name # 项目名字，起：fumadocs-basic
│  fumadocs-basic
│
◇  Choose a template # 选择模板，有4种,我选 Next.js: Fumadocs MDX
    ● Next.js: Fumadocs MDX (recommended),│
    ○ Next.js: Content Collections
    ○ React Router: MDX Remote
    ○ Tanstack Start: MDX Remote
│  Next.js: Fumadocs MDX
│
◇  Use `/src` directory?
│  Yes
│
◇  Add default ESLint configuration?
│  Yes
│
◇  Do you want to install packages automatically? (detected as pnpm)
│  Yes
│
◑  Configured ESLint..
```

```bash filename="启动" switcher
pnpm dev
```

```ts filename="报错(google字体处理)" switcher
// 错误提示： Module not found: Can't resolve '@vercel/turbopack-next/internal/font/google/font'

// 修改src/app/layout.tsx
import "./global.css";
import { RootProvider } from "fumadocs-ui/provider";
// import { Inter } from 'next/font/google';
import type { ReactNode } from "react";

// const inter = Inter({
//   subsets: ['latin'],
// });
const fontFamily = {
  fontFamily:
    "14px/1.5 Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,Arial,Microsoft Yahei,Hiragino Sans GB,Heiti SC,WenQuanYi Micro Hei,sans-serif",
};
export default function Layout({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
  return (
    // <html lang="en" className={inter.className} suppressHydrationWarning>
    <html lang="zh" style={fontFamily} suppressHydrationWarning>
      <body className="flex flex-col min-h-screen">
        <RootProvider>{children}</RootProvider>
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}
```

```ts filename="修改logo" switcher
    ),
  },
  // see https://fumadocs.dev/docs/ui/navigation/links
  links: [

  ],
};

```

```bash filename="文档目录" switcher
# 所有文档都放在/www2024/0_common/documents下面
ln -s /www2024/0_common/documents /www2024/4_tutorial/2025/fumadocs-basic/content2025/docs
# rm /www2024/4_tutorial/2025/fumadocs-basic/content2025/docs
```
